00019 extern SCREEN _cursvar;
00020 
00021 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022                         PROTOTYPES
00023 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00024 static void show_bar(void);
00025 static void calc_pulldownbar(MENU_HEAD *head);
00026 static void mem_pulldownbar(void);

00028 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029                         LOCAL VARIABLES
00030 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00031 static int  *columns;                  /* Ptr to array of start columns     */
00032 static char *hotkeys;                  /* Ptr to array of hotkeys           */
00033 static MENU_HEAD *cptr = NULL;         /* Copy of ptr to first menu header  */
00034 static MENU_HEAD *head = NULL;         /* Copy of ptr to actual menu header */
00035 static int  no_heads = 0;              /* Number of menu headers            */
00036 static int  menu;                      /* Selected menu                     */
00037 static MENU *mptr;                     /* Pointer to menu tree              */
00038 static WINDOW *pd_bar = NULL;          /* Window with pulldown bar          */

00041                         START OF FUNCTIONS

00044 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     FUNCTION: show_bar()
00046      PURPOSE: Show the bar of the pulldown menu
00047  DESCRIPTION: -
00048      RETURNS: nothing
00049      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Initial version
00050 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 static void show_bar()
00052 {
00053   int i;
00054   int col;
00055 
00056   wn_log_indent(2);
00057   wn_log("SHOW_BAR *****()\n");
00058 
00059   /*----------------------------------------------------------
00060     Check if pulldownbar already openened. If not, do it here
00061   ------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062   if (!pd_bar)
00063   {
00064     pd_bar = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,1,_menu_att,_menu_att);
00065     col = 1;
00066     for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
00067     {
00068       /*--- show header ---*/
00069       hotstring(0,col,head[i].hotkey,head[i].header,_menu_att);
00070       col += strlen(head[i].header) + 2;
00071     }
00072     wn_save(pd_bar);
00073   }
00074   else
00075     wn_restore(pd_bar);
00076 
00077   wn_log("END SHOW_BAR *****\n");
00078   wn_log_indent(-2);
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*#+func----------------------------------------------------------------
00082    FUNCTION: pulldown()
00083     PURPOSE: Show pulldown menu bar and react on key strokes
00084       INPUT: MENU_HEAD *shead  : pointer to header information array
00085              int       ikey    : Default key to react on
00086              char      *help   : Pointer to help subject
00087  DESRIPTION: -
00088     RETURNS: 0 or valid key scan-code
00089     VERSION: 901115 V0.5
00090              910829 V0.6 - Using popup() now for generality
00091 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 int pulldown(MENU_HEAD *shead, int ikey, char *menu_help)
00093 {
00094   unsigned int  key;
00095   char c;
00096   int match = FALSE;
00097   unsigned int choise = 0;
00098   int i;
00099 
00100   wn_log_indent(2);
00101   wn_log("pulldown() MENU_HEAD=%p\n",shead);
00102 
00103   /* SHOW MENU HEADERS
00104   --------------------*/
00105   pulldown_bar(shead);
00106 
00107   /*----------------------------------------
00108      Use initial key or wait for a keypress
00109   -----------------------------------------*/
00110   wn_log("pulldown() - Waiting for first key press\n");
00111   if (ikey)
00112     key = ikey;
00113   else
00114     key = waitkey();
00115   wn_log("key pressed = %x\n",key);
00116 
00117   /*--- If function key, react on it  */
00118   if (is_fkey(key)) {
00119     wn_log("function key pressed\n");
00120     switch(key) {
00121       case F1:  help(menu_help); return(0); break;
00122       default:  do_funkey(key); break;
00123     }
00124   }
00125 
00126   /*--- If ESC key, return  */
00127   if (key == ESC_KEY)
00128     return(ESC_KEY);
00129 
00130   c = (char) (key & 0x00FF);
00131   wn_log("character = <%c>\n",c);
00132 
00133   /*----------------------------------------------
00134     Check if key matches with one of the hotkeys
00135   -----------------------------------------------*/
00136   for (i=0 ; i<strlen(hotkeys) ; i++) {
00137     if (c == hotkeys[i] || toupper(c) == hotkeys[i]) {
00138           wn_log("we have a hotkey match\n");
00139           match = TRUE;
00140           break;
00141         }
00142   }
00143   if (match == TRUE) {
00144     menu = i;
00145   }
00146   else {
00147     wn_log("no match found\n");
00148     return(key);
00149   }
00150 
00151 
00152   /* THERE IS A MATCH ...
00153   ----------------------*/
00154   v_cursoroff();
00155   while(TRUE)
00156   {
00157     mptr = head[menu].mptr;
00158         wn_log("mptr = %p\n",mptr);
00159     if (head[menu].number != 0)
00160       choise = popup(head[menu].number,mptr,1,columns[menu]);
00161     else
00162     {
00163           wn_log("pulldown() - check if a function is defined\n");
00164       /*---------------------------------------------
00165         If a function was defined, perform function
00166       -----------------------------------------------*/
00167       if (mptr[0].function != NULL) {
00168             wn_log("perform function \n");
00169         (*(PFI)(mptr[0].function))();
00170           }
00171     }
00172 
00173     wn_log("choise = %x\n",choise);
00174     switch(choise)
00175     {
00176       case ARROW_LEFT:
00177         v_setattrib_area(0, columns[menu], strlen(head[menu].header), 1, _menu_att);
00178         menu = (--menu + no_heads) % no_heads;
00179         show_bar();
00180         break;
00181 
00182       case ARROW_RIGHT:
00183         v_setattrib_area(0, columns[menu], strlen(head[menu].header), 1, _menu_att);
00184         menu = ++menu % no_heads;
00185         show_bar();
00186         break;
00187 
00188       default:
00189         break;
00190     } /* switch(choise) */
00191 
00192     if (choise == ESC_KEY)
00193       break;
00194 
00195   } /* while(TRUE) */
00196   show_bar();
00197   return(0);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------
00201     FUNCTION: calc_pulldownbar()
00202      PURPOSE: Perform calculations for the pulldown bar
00203  DESCRIPTION: -
00204      RETURNS: nothing
00205      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Calculations moved from pulldown_bar()
00206                             to this function to be more readable.
00207 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00208 static void calc_pulldownbar(MENU_HEAD *head)
00209 {
00210   int i,j;
00211   int col;
00212   MENU *m;         /* Pointer to menu        */
00213 
00214 
00215   wn_log("calc_pulldownbar()\n");
00216 
00217   /*-------------------------------------------
00218     Preprocess the entrys of each menu[header]
00219   ---------------------------------------------*/
00220   for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
00221   {
00222     m = head[i].mptr;
00223     j = 0;
00224     while (m->header)
00225     {
00226       strcpy(m->string,m->header);   /* Copy header to string            */
00227       j++;                           /* Increase counter                 */
00228       m = m+1;                       /* Update menu pointer              */
00229       head[i].number = j;            /* Update cntr of number of entries */
00230     }
00231   }
00232 
00233   col = 1;                      /* start column of first header */
00234   for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
00235   {
00236     /*--- Save header hotkey and header start column ---*/
00237     columns[i] = col;
00238     hotkeys[i] = toupper(head[i].header[head[i].hotkey]);
00239     col += strlen(head[i].header) + 2;
00240   }
00241 
00242   hotkeys[no_heads] = '\0';  /* Terminate the array of hotkeys   */
00243 }
00244 
00245 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00246     FUNCTION: mem_pulldownbar()
00247      PURPOSE: Perform memory manupilation for the pulldown bar
00248  DESCRIPTION: -
00249      RETURNS: nothing
00250      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Mem manupilations moved from pulldown_bar()
00251                             to this function to be more readable.
00252 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00253 static void mem_pulldownbar()
00254 {
00255   /*--------------------------------------------
00256     ALLOCATE OR REALLOCATE MEMORY FOR 'COLUMNS'
00257   ----------------------------------------------*/
00258   if (columns == NULL)
00259   { if ((columns = (int *) malloc(no_heads*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
00260     { printf("Out of memory\n");
00261       exit(1);
00262     }
00263   }
00264   else
00265   {
00266     if ((columns = (int *) realloc((char *)columns,no_heads*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
00267     {
00268       printf("Out of memory\n");
00269       exit(1);
00270     }
00271   }
00272 
00273   /*---------------------------------------------
00274     ALLOCATE OR REALLOCATE MEMORY FOR 'HOTKEYS'
00275   ----------------------------------------------*/
00276   if (hotkeys == NULL)
00277   {
00278     if ((hotkeys = malloc((no_heads+1)*sizeof(char))) == NULL)
00279     {
00280       printf("Out of memory\n");
00281       exit(1);
00282     }
00283   }
00284   else
00285   {
00286     if ((hotkeys = realloc(hotkeys,(no_heads+1)*sizeof(char))) == NULL)
00287     {
00288       printf("Out of memory\n");
00289       exit(1);
00290     }
00291   }
00292 }
00293 
00294 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00295     FUNCTION: pulldown_bar()
00296      PURPOSE: perform initial calculations for activiting 'pulldown'
00297  DESCRIPTION: -
00298      RETURNS: nothing
00299      HISTORY: 920223 V0.2
00300 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00301 void pulldown_bar(MENU_HEAD *shead)  /* Pointer to array of headers */
00302 {
00303   MENU_HEAD *h;
00304 
00305   wn_log("pulldown_bar() MENU_HEAD=%p\n",shead);
00306 
00307   /*--------------------------------------
00308     If same menuline as last time, return
00309   ----------------------------------------*/
00310   if (cptr == shead)
00311     return;
00312   else
00313   {
00314     cptr = shead;
00315     head = shead;
00316   }
00317 
00318   /*-------------------------------
00319     Determine number of menu heads
00320     this must be done before calling
00321     mem_pulldownbar()
00322   ---------------------------------*/
00323   h = shead;
00324   while (h->header)
00325   {
00326     no_heads++;
00327     h++;
00328   }
00329 
00330   /*------------------------------
00331     Assign memory and
00332     Perform initial calculations
00333     Show the menu bar
00334   -------------------------------*/
00335   mem_pulldownbar();
00336   calc_pulldownbar(head);
00337   show_bar();
00338 
00339 }
00340 
00341 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00342     FUNCTION: exit_pulldown()
00343      PURPOSE: exit from pulldown menu
00344  DESCRIPTION: free's allocated memory
00345      RETURNS: nothing
00346      HISTORY: 920107 V0.1 - Initial version
00347 --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00348 void exit_pulldown()
00349 {
00350   wn_log("exit_pulldown()\n");
00351   
00352   if (hotkeys)
00353     free(hotkeys);
00354   if (columns)
00355     free((char *)columns);
00356 }
